title: Why and How to Use Demographics in UX
excerpt: Well-designed questions related to age, gender, race, income and other demographic characteristics help UX researchers screen participants, recruit a diverse participant pool, and segment data. These questions are sensitive and should put research participants at ease.

title: Personas: Study Guide
excerpt: Unsure where to start? Use this collection of links to our articles and videos to learn about personas and how to create and apply them.

title: Antipersonas: What, How, Who, and Why?
excerpt: Antipersonas help anticipate how products can be misused in ways that can harm users and the business.
